official_title: A bill to establish a five-year pilot program to collect recreational use fees for facilities and services provided by the Angeles National Forest, California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to charge recreation services use fees for the Angeles National Forest, California, during 1987 through 1991. Requires such fees to be placed in a special fund in the Treasury for the maintenance of recreation facilities and areas within such Forest. Permits the Secretary to authorize concessionaires or volunteers to collect such fees.

titles.title: A bill to establish a five-year pilot program to collect recreational use fees for facilities and services provided by the Angeles National Forest, California, and for other purposes.
